<ContactForm>
  <FormField>
    <FormLabel for="name">Name:</FormLabel>
    <FormInput type="text" id="name" />
  </FormField>

    <FormInput type="email" id="email" />
  </FormField>
  <FormField>
    <FormLabel for="message">Message:</FormLabel>
    <FormInput as="textarea" id="message" />
  </FormField>
  <FormSubmitButton>Send</FormSubmitButton>
</ContactForm>
